subject: Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The former Olympian Antonio Pettigrew, a sprinter stripped of a gold medal after admitting to doping, was found dead in the backseat of his locked car early Tuesday in Raleigh, N.C.
snippet: The former Olympian Antonio Pettigrew, a sprinter stripped of a gold medal after admitting to doping, was found dead in the backseat of his locked car early Tuesday in Raleigh, N.C.
